title: Eventide
description: Change a would be eye soar of a parking garage into a eye catching digital art piece. Using a combination of C++ applications and web applications we built a system that allowed the county to easily display and manipulate content on an array of over 800 lights.
role: Created visual content and patterns for display. Developed an accessible user portal for uploading and scheduling of lighting content.
intro: Over 800 lights synchronized for programmable playback.

title: Convergence
description: An interactive artistic interpretation of the Cabrillo National Monument and the natural landscape around it. Using an old television piece we modulated classic surf music to be unrecognizable and abstract when interaction wasn't happening. Then as viewers approached the piece it the sounds would become more and more recognizable.
role: Ideation, fabrication, and sound manipulation programming.

title: Innovation Clock
description: Visual monolith located in building lobby. It gathers social media data and interpreting that to display relevant messaging for people to see as they come and go from the building. The data is also used to generate patterns on the lower resolution back of the monolith, as well as decorative facade lighting on the exterior of the building.
role: Created a back-end Twitter feed parser. Programed the display and animation of the large text on the main display.
intro: Cinder based lobby and building display.

title: Inflorescent Crescendo
description: The goal was to combine technology with nature to make an immersive experience. We used frequency sweeping capacitive touch to make the plants that control a generative musical experience that was driven by Pure-Data and Ableton Live. Basically you touch the plants and they make music.
role: Ideation, Capacitive touch circuit fabrication and software.
intro: Plants that react to touch and playback music.

title: Jabil BlueSky Center
description: A massive touch video wall that showcases Jabil's innovations and capabilities to existing and prospecting clients. Made up of 18 HD Tuio touch screens. The wall runs off of 3 Mac Pro that present a synchronized interactive experience created in Cinder. Allowing for 3 separate interactive zones across the wall.
role: Creating the showcase animation across all zones. 3D oscillating "cube world" that would spin cubes up from the background to the foreground to reveal images assets corresponding to the category being displayed. Animation of text.

title: Miraj
description: A tvOS application that creates an psychedelic kaleidescope/mandala like visualization based off of phrases spoken into the Siri remote.
role: Created an image gathering server that serves the tvOS application. Built the swift UI for the application. Early visualization prototyping and ideation.
intro: A psychedelic Apple TV app that visualizes phrases.

title: Qronicles of Invention
description: An application that showcases Qualcomm's massive collection of patents that is informative and interactive. Utilizing D3.js to visualize over 30,000 patents in a timeline format. Allowing viewers to scroll and search for patents. The viewer can click on the individual patents to reveal more detailed information about a particular patent. Also showcasing the story of Qualcomm through the years with a story overlay that is also interactive.
role: Worked on all aspects of the application. Creating a packing algorithm for building the patent grid. Dynamic D3 scrolling that gives the application the ability to work even on a mobile device. Also creation of a CMS that allows Qualcomm to update all aspects of the application from stories to the patents themselves.
intro: Thirty thousand patents visualized with D3.js

title: Who's Got Next
description: A pop quiz touch application that is used during social events. Branded with company logos and content and polished with dynamic animations. A web application that looks like a custom piece of touch software.
role: Animations and application integration and deployment.

title: Behavioral Health Visualization
description: Web based interactive dataviz application. Visualizing a health network's patient data by demographic and diagnoses. Viewers can navigate the data by using the controls to change the data comparison.
role: Parsing and data interpretation. Chart visualization with D3.js as well as hover/click overlays.

title: Life
role: Dad, Husband, Brother, Son, Climber, Cyclist
intro: I don't always sit at a computer.
